name: Viy // experimental pixel shooter mini-game
description:
https://katiastu.github.io/new-game
Click here to play the game

Experimental pixel shooter mini-game made in Microsoft MakeCode.
The shooter is inspired by Mykolaj Gogol's "Viy" and its' 1967 Soviet Ukrainian adaptation.

Controls:

KeysActionArrowsMove character/cursorZShoot with burning crossesYMake shield by drawing the circle around you, but be aware - it has a short duration
